turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Nyambi.
turn.2: Nyambi Nyambi is a mythical deity of old Hambukushu tribe in the north western region of Botswana, in Southern Africa.
turn.4: The myth tells a story of the creation of people from a molten rock.
turn.5: Is there anything else that is notable?
turn.6: It says that people were required by Nyambi to pass through a fire for purification after creation.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Dark skinned people are said to have passed slowly through the fire; while light skinned people passed through fast.
turn.9: Is there anything else that is note worthy ?
turn.10: The Hambukushu believe that Nyambi created animals after molding people from the same molten rock.
